title: Thérèse King
text:
Thérèse King (15 July 1934 in <a href="Ziguinchor">Ziguinchor</a> – 16 April 2015 in <a href="Dakar">Dakar</a>) was a <a href="Senegal">Senegal</a>ese politician. She was the Minister of Public Health from April 5th, 1988 to March 27th, 1990 under the presidency of <a href="Abdou%20Diouf">Abdou Diouf</a>. She was one of the first women government ministers in Senegal, and the second female Minister of Public Health after <a href="Marie%20Sarr%20Mbodj">Marie Sarr Mbodj</a>.
She also chaired the Ziguinchor Regional Union of Socialist Women.
In 2010, she was made a Grand Cross of the <a href="National%20Order%20of%20the%20Lion">National Order of the Lion</a>.
